thread.title: Green Energy Italia launched the new Energy Storage from 3 to 10 kWp
thread.title_full: Green Energy Italia launched the new Energy Storage from 3 to 10 kWp

author: archyde
title: Green Energy Italia launched the new Energy Storage from 3 to 10 kWp
text:
Green Energy Italia launched the system Energy Storage a product all in one available in sizes will give 3 kWp and 10 kWp.
Lâ€™ Energy Storage it is assembled, pre-wired in the factory and customized according to the needs of the end customer. It also includes on board all the protection and safety systems, communication systems and features necessary according to the regulations and certifications in force in Italy.
The product can be customized according to needs, basic or full optional which includes an internet connection method, with or without EPS Anti Black Out, software preparation for home automation and energy communities, up to the communication kit with other inverters and wall-boxes, or residential wind power in support of photovoltaics.
The Green Energy Italia Energy Storage system is ready for use and only needs to be connected to the modules and the network, with a significant saving of time and installation space.
From January 2025, Energy Storage will be even more convenient and versatile. The metal body and its components will be modular, allowing the installer to save further space and reach installation locations where previously it would have been impossible to install.
Thanks to its innovative proprietary software, the Energy Storage is controlled and monitored 100% remotely by competent technicians. The Energy Storage is started and self-tested remotely, for further time savings for the professional and a quick and effective after-sales service.
The manufacturing company declares that the average installation, census and machine start-up time is approximately 15 minutes.
For more information Click here
